sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog
    v-model="dialogAddStudent"
    max-width="400"
  >
    <template v-slot:activator="{ props: activatorProps }">
        <v-btn
         v-bind="activatorProps"
          density="compact"
          icon="mdi-account-plus"
          variant="text"
          size="small"
        />
    </template>
    <v-card
      prepend-icon="mdi-account-school"
      title="Adicionar Alunos"
    >
      <template v-slot:text>
        <v-list lines="students" class="flex-grow-1">
          <v-list-item
            v-for="student in students"
            :key="student.id"
            :title="student.name"
          >
            <template v-slot:append>
              <v-btn
                color="grey-lighten-1"
                icon="mdi-plus"
                variant="text"
                @click="addStudent(student.id)"
              />
            </template>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </template>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
// import { ref } from 'vue'

import { defineComponent } from 'vue'
import api from '@/api/api';

  export default defineComponent ({
    name: 'AddStudent',

    props: {
      schoolCourseId: {
        type: Number,
        default: null
      },
      studentsCurrent: {
        type: Array,
        default: []
      }
    },
    setup(props) {
      return { props }
    },
  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    dialogAddStudent: false,
    students: []
  }),
  computed: {
  },
  watch: {
  },
  async created () {
    await this.listStudents()
    console.log(this.studentsCurrent)
    console.log(this.studentsCurrent)
  },

  methods: {
    close () {
      this.dialogAddStudent = false
    },

    async listStudents () {
      this.loading = true
      try {
        this.students = await api.listStudents()
        this.availableStudents()
        this.loading = false
      } catch (e) {
        this.loading = false
        console.log(e)
      }
    },

    availableStudents () {
      // console.log(this.students)
      // console.log(this.studentsCurrent)

    },

    async addStudent (studentId) {
      console.log(studentId)
      this.loading = true
      const data = {
        school_course_id: this.schoolCourseId,
        student_id: studentId
      }
      try {
        await api.enrollment(data)
        this.$emit('reload')
        this.loading = false
        this.close()
      } catch (e) {
        this.loading = false
        console.log(e)
      }
    }
  }
})
</script>
